title: Add okane-golden coverage
body: we are missing running test over okane-golden for coverage collection.

title: Refactoring: okane-golden as a separate crate
body: It's reusable component.

title: Avoid including files starting with dot on glob
body:
Unless the include glob pattern as explicit dot,
we won't read it.
This helps when Emacs create temprary files.

title: Fix: do not round on each posting
body:
If we have conversion at each posting, often we'll have remainder.
However, we should not round those at each posting. Why?
Assume the following situation.

```
   Expense        1 CHF @ 100.5 JPY
   Expense        1 CHF @ 100.5 JPY
   Asset       -201 JPY
```

This is totally legit, however, if you apply banker's round,
two expenses are evaluated as 100 JPY and there will be 1 JPY
unbalanced.

title: Don't fail on benchmark regression for continuous run.
body: Otherwise we won't track the main branch results.

title: Add tests about balance command, more errors.
body: Add more integration tests.

title: Refactoring: Restructured the test to use rstest in cli as well
body: As `core` tests already uses `rstest`, we can use the same machinery for `cli` tests.

title: Add tests to cover end-to-end behavior
body: Add more tests to cover some fundamental use cases.

title: Refactor: Add balance amount posting
body: This will be used later in `-X` option.

title: In `import` CLI, put debits earlier than credits.
body: Usually 借方 / debits comes earlier than 貸方 / credits.

title: Add conversion feature to balance command
body:
This adds `-X`, `--price-db`, `--historical` integration to the balance command.

Once it's done, `register` command won't be hard to implement.

title: Refactoring: organize Amount types into different modules
body: Those intereact with each other, but probably ok to be in the different files.

title: Add report_bench to test with on-memory files.
body: This allows us to test multiple variants

title: Fix: zero hit glob
body: Throw an error on zero hit glob

title: Updated winnow to 0.7.0
body: No feature change

title: Feature: Add test for query balance
body: Add unit test for balance, before adding conversion.

title: fix: Post accounting parse to support multi-byte characters
body:
Previously it took the byte length of posting acount characters, and tries to take the same amount of "char".
It won't work for non-ASCII characters, and inefficient as it was 3-pass algorithm.
changed to use repeat_till with peek.

title: Added coverage CI workflow.
body: This also adds caching to cargo.

title: Change Evaluable::eval to eval_mut, as it accepts mut context
body:
Later we can prepare `eval()` method as well,
which will treat context as immutable, better once `report::process` completes.

title: feat: Use self defined ParseError instead of winnow error
body:
Winnow error holds `'i` lifetime, often not good for `Error::source` which requires `'static`.
Changed to use our self defined `ParseError`.

title: Fix: Reject same commodity exchange on import
body:
Prohibit emitting 1 EUR @ 1.2 EUR like conversion, that's an error.

Also provide a feature to disable conversion to avoid hitting this error on certain condition.

This solves #200.

title: Corrected push target of benchmark CI.
body: It was simply wrong, copy-n-pasted from the example.

title: Add GitHub workflow benchmark.
body: Monitor benchmark results continuously.

title: Added benchmark for report::query functions.
body: We need some tracking for those functions

title: feat: Disallow certain conditions around exchange.
body:
Addded 3 types of error for exchange rate.

Contributes to #189, not covering the entire error though.

title: Fix: Correctly handle balance condition
body:
#211 broke the balance condition by treating `0` and `0 X` equally.
This PR reverts the behavior, and instead force leaving the commodity with `0` in `Amount`.

title: Refactoring: Updated visibility, added comments
body:
* Hide `report::eval::PostingAmount`, which won't be useful (at least for now) for users.
* Expose `parse::parse_ledger` as API, this is useful.
* Added comments to book keeping logic, as it's getting complex.

title: Provide okane commodity eval command to test --price-db and --exchange logic.
body:
With `--exchange` option user can convert the commodities in Ledger into specified commodity.
Also `--price-db` would give the separated price information 

This PR won't support `balance` or `register` yet, but allows user to try out evaluation with `--exchange` option.

Once this PR is merged, adding conversion to `balance` or `register` won't be hard.

title: Refactoring: cli commands to delegate more to report::query.
body: Now report::query can process posting depending on the given query.

title: Cleanup: Factor out Ledger struct
body: Factor out the result of `report::process()` as `Ledger` struct.

title: Fix: Upgrade deps, fixed warnings
body: Fixed all warnings related to winnow, as well as clippy warnings with the latest Rust.

title: Fix: include support glob pattern
body: This PR fixes #204, supports glob pattern like "**/*.ledger" in `include` directive.

title: Upgrade dependencies
body: That'll fix http://github.com/xkikeg/okane/security/dependabot/9.

title: Add --price-db flag to balance command.
body:
This flag is still experimental,
only used to count the number of lines yet.

title: Provide default commodity conversion
body: Now commodity conversion provided when `secondary_commodity` / `secondary_amount` / `rate` is given.

title: Fix SingleEntry to emit charge commodity rate.
body:
Now the `import` emits commodity rate on charges as well.

This also simplifies single entry transaction to syntax conversion.

title: Support more diversed ISO Camt053 file format
body:
Allows having more diversed ISO Camt053 files, such as

* Allows `<DtTm>` in addition to `<Dt>`
* Allows `<BkTxCd>` to have `<Prtry>` in addition to `<Domn>`
* Allows matcher over `AddtlNtryInf` as `additional_entry_info`

title: Bump version to 0.14.0-dev
body: Bump version to 0.14.0-dev following 0.13.0 release.

title: Update dependencies
body: Upgrade quick_xml to 0.37, unicode_width to 0.2.

title: Add test with the proper template.
body: This also fixes the test.

title: Add CSV note as a comment.
body: That'll be simply convenient.

title: Feature: Allow column index to be a template field
body:
We used to allow template with field key

```yaml
payee:
  template: "{category} - {note}"
```

This PR allows specifying int as well.


```yaml
payee:
  template: "{category} - {2}"
```

title: Use 1-origin index for CSV column
body:
Probably no consumer tool uses 0-origin index.

It's debatable okane is a consumer tool or a tool for a geek,
but still using 1-origin sounds more legit for CSV file.

title: Add located error
body:
Report error when the program fails to compute the amount with the original file location.

This is an initial version on one particular type of error, it could be extended later.

Larger scope: #185

title: Rename repl module to syntax
body: Repl (representation) is a bit awkward, and it's indeed syntax.

title: Add plain / tracked to syntax types
body:
Depending on the context, we may want to have a value with extra information `Tracked<T>`, or simple `T`.
Concretely, we want the original bytes position `Range<u64>`  on parser, while we don't have such an information on generating the value.
This could be allowed with GAT behaving like a higher kinded type.

title: Removed datamodel module.
body: This module is not needed.

title: Cleanup: Remove datamodel dependencies from cli
body: This is a preparation for `datamodel` ablation.

title: Bump main branch version to 0.13.0-dev.
body: We released 0.12, so bump to 0.13.

title: Release: Release preparation for 0.12
body: Update dependencies and CHANGELOG.

title: Correct intern insert not to return value on alias
body: It used to return invalid value on alias registration. That was not used, but it's potentially dangerous.

title: Feature: Support exchange in balance assertion
body:
Assert balance condition with considering multi commodities.

This enables thte balance assertion that were disabled due to incomplete logic.

title: Separate CommodityStore
body: This is a preparation of the following changes.

title: Feature: Support correct balance
body:
It used to deduce the following balance assertion in a wrong way when `Account 1` has multi commodities balance.

```
2024/08/01 Foo
   Account 1           = 10 JPY
   Account 2
```

It must set the balance of `Account 1` to 10 JPY + X other commodities, but it used to set exactly 10 JPY.

title: Fix leak book keeping
body:
It used to leaked all `transaction.posting.amount`.

it'll be tricky to move `Amount` map into `Bump`, as mostly it's temporal and having it in arena can consume memory more than needed.

title: Corrected ReportContext / intern lifetime.
body: It used to be bounded to ReportContext reference lifetime, but it must be Arena lifetime.

title: Support transaction fee in CSV format
body: It's straightforward, so let's support it in CSV as well.

title: Bump version to 0.12.0-dev
body: Now v0.11 was released, so mainline should proceed to v0.12.0-dev.

title: Prepare release 0.11
body: release prep

title: Supported ISO Camt053 version 2019 Pty.
body: In ver 2019, it has <Pty> element within <Cdtr>/<Dbtr>/... This change supports both version.

title: Add template syntax in fields spec
body: Now we can have a generated value in CSV format.

title: Change import conversion
body:
It used to super complicated, hard to understand what happened.

This is a step to support Schwab.

title: Added minimal cryptic document for okane import in ja_JP.
body: This doc is still WIP, probably not understandable except for me. But I also started to forget the spec, so I need to write it down.

title: Improved PrettyDecimal parse failure message.
body: This fixes the current issue, also fixed to show the incorrect char not byte.

title: Support brokers
body: Support amount with commodity, especially prefixed commodity like `-$123,456.78`

title: Support account and commodity alias
body:
Ledger supports alias for both account and commodity and which is a critical feature.

Behavior difference from Ledger:

-   We explicitly prohibits having a alias which used to be a canonical. For example, below snippets are invalid:
    ```
    accounts Foo
      alias Bar
    accounts Baz
      alias Foo
    ```
-   We explicitly prohibits having a canonical which used to be a alias. Below are invalid:
    ```
    accounts Foo
      alias Bar
    accounts Bar
      alias Baz
    ```
- [derived from those 2] We prohibits having a self referencing alias. Below are invalid:
    ```
    accounts Foo
      alias Foo
    ```

This is to avoid complicated cyclic alias detection

title: Fix Clippy warnings
body:
* Reduced `ReportError` size
* Removed redundant `'static` from const

title: Report the errornous transaction on book keep error
body: Now we print the error causing transaction.

title: Decimal improvements
body: Use `bytes` for parsing.

title: Print correct line number for the parse error
body:
It used to have a wrong line number printed,
so now we compute the correct line number.

title: Changed FileSystem from enum to trait.
body: This doesn't need to be enum given we only use Prod in prod.

title: Updated dependencies, also CHANGELOG.
body: prep for version 0.10.0 release.

title: Documentation update
body: Update docs.

title: Add pretty basic registry and balance feature.
body:
With this feature, users can see the register and balance report. register can point to one particular account, without any vague match. No support for commodity support.

#126

title: To static for test
body: With `bounded-static` crate power, we can derive cloned `LedgerEntry` which is easier to test with simple `assert_eq!`.

title: Add annotate-snippets support to pretty print errors.
body:
This makes the error much readable.
Curerntly line_number is wrong, so anonymized for now. Eventually it should be solved.

title: Use Stream bound instead of &str
body: Now it uses the fixed type `&str`, but it should be updated to `I: Stream` to support Located.

title: Add testing support to load, with making it Loader struct
body: This would support future migraiton supporting non-include stream better, also gives flexibility to write hermetic test easily.

title: Use dispatch instead of alt
body: Gives -5% win on report_bench.

title: Renamed eval to report
body: Eventually eval module may be recreated purely for expression evaluation.

title: Change repl type to be a reference of loaded String
body: Given repl is short-lived object either for Display or parsed results, there's little value to use owned String.

title: Renamed repl::parser module to parse.
body: Simple refactoring.

title: Change parse_ledger to return an iterator instead of Vec
body: This `repl::LedgerEntry` should be short-lived item and could be reduced to be iterator.

title: Reduce benchmark testing program with refactoring
body: Previous benchmark input was invalid, and we can't handle that large input (yet).

title: Allow clap to infer subcommand if shortened.
body: Clap can accept  `bal` instead of `balance`, or `reg` instead of `register`.

title: Move load module into separated out of eval.
body:
Now we put too much items into `eval` module, while the current plan is to limit the `eval` module only focusing on expression evaluation, and leave any other larger scope functionality to `report` module.

This PR is part of #126 .

title: Correctly parses the ClearState in the posting line.
body:
We used to ignore the clearing mark (`!*`) in the posting lines.
This PR fixes the issue and parses those marks correctly.

title: Add accounts command to list all accounts
body:
`accounts` command is one of the most primitive command to list all accounts without any transaction details.

This change includes `EvalContext` carrying all evaluation context (such as commodity, accounts)
and Arena-based allocation plus local String interner.

title: Add primitive flatten command with recursive loader
body: This implements the first milestone of #126 .

title: Release prep for v0.9.0
body: Added changelog, upgraded dependencies.

title: Improve parsers
body:
Minor improvements for parsers.

Probably I should stop working on minor improvements and focus on making it streaming.

title: Replace nom with winnow
body:
That looks having better UX.

Solves #118 .

title: Add Cargo Deny config
body: That would ensure license issue.
